titles.title: VET MED Act
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for interest-free deferment on student loans for borrowers serving in a veterinary internship or residency program.
VET MED Act
Veterinary Education and Training Minimizes Educational Debt Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Veterinary Education and Training Minimizes Educational Debt Act or the VET MED Act
This bill allows veterinary students who are enrolled in postgraduate training programs or serving in internships or residencies to defer payment on their Federal Direct Loans for up to five years. Loan interest shall not accrue during such deferment.
